data: This PowerPlan is for the ordering of labwork for a Massive Transfusion only. To initiate the Massive Transfusion Protocol, follow site-specific processes
Massive transfusion is anticipating needing 3 units or more of RBCs within the first hour
Inform blood bank that the Massive Transfusion Protocol has been initiated. Provide the blood bank with the patients' name, birth date and Medical Record Number
Bloodwork is only scheduled to occur for 3 hours. Order additional bloodwork as necessary beyond 3 hours
Whole Blood, STAT, Collection: T;N, once
Basic Metabolic Panel (Lytes, Urea, Creat, Gluc)
POC Basic Metabolic Panel (Lytes, Urea, Creat, Gluc)
Whole Blood, STAT, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Timed, Collection: T;N+60, q1h interval for 2 doses or times
Whole Blood, Timed, Collection: T;N+60, q1h interval for 2 doses or times
